name: Timothy M. Chan
content: Timothy M. Chan Timothy M. Chan Siebel School of Computing and Data Science University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign 201 N. Goodwin Ave. Urbana, IL 61801, USA E-mail: tmc "at" illinois "dot" edu Office: Siebel 3230 I am a Founder Professor in Engineering, and in the Theory and Algorithms group. (Prior to joining UIUC, I taught at the Cheriton School of Computer Science, University of Waterloo from 1999 to 2016.)
